channel.title: Please help. I have a client problem! paying!
channel.description:
Well I would like to start of by saying, I now people don't spoon feeding you the information but i really do need to be spoon fed the information, for which i will [b]PAY[/b] cash for. We make a deal on skype or msn.
So what is the problem I have with my client. Well it's a "null" problem. I think the following picture will explain better: [IMG]http://i1180.photobucket.com/albums/x405/jimmy786/null-1.png[/img]
My msn : saadifzal@hotmail.com skype: jimmy.i786
Thanks
